LanguageData.Pa_PaK36ATG.label: 3.7cm Pak 36/L45 Anti-Tank Gun
LanguageData.Pa_Flak37AA.label: 3.7cm Flak 37/L89 Anti-Tank Gun
LanguageData.Turret_Pak36ATG.label: 3.7cm PaK 36 ATG
LanguageData.Turret_Pak36ATG.description: PaK 36/L45 3.7cm Anti-Tank Gun, an ancient Early War Light Anti-Tank gun, versatile and relatively light to positioning, kind of obsolete but still can punch a hole on light armored target.
LanguageData.Turret_Flak37AA.label: 3.7cm Flak 37 AA
LanguageData.Turret_Flak37AA.description: Flak 37/L89 3.7cm Anti-Aircraft Gun, an ancient Early War Anti-Aircraft gun, relatively low rate of fire and small size to move around, the 3.7cm shell pack enough firepower to deal with most light armored target.
LanguageData.Pa_SimpleCannon_Crate.label: Simple Cannon Crate
LanguageData.Pa_SimpleCannon_Crate.description: Use this to build any ancient light and medium cannon/AT gun.
LanguageData.MinifiedTurret_Pa_PaK36ATG.label: PaK 36/L45 3.7cm ATG
LanguageData.MinifiedTurret_Pa_Flak37AA.label: PaK 37/L89 3.7cm AA
